statements: SELECT * FROM MealPlanner ORDER BY meal_name ASC;
SELECT meal_name, calories FROM MealPlanner WHERE meal_type = 'Breakfast' ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT meal_name, protein_g, carbs_g, fats_g FROM MealPlanner WHERE calories <= 500;
SELECT meal_name, meal_type FROM MealPlanner WHERE protein_g >= 20 AND carbs_g <= 50;
SELECT * FROM MealPlanner WHERE fats_g > 10 ORDER BY fats_g DESC, meal_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MealPlanner WHERE calories <= 500 ORDER BY meal_name ASC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_type, calories FROM MealPlanner WHERE protein_g >= 20 AND carbs_g <= 50 ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_type, protein_g, carbs_g, fats_g FROM MealPlanner WHERE calories BETWEEN 300 AND 600 ORDER BY meal_type ASC;
SELECT meal_name, calories, protein_g, carbs_g, fats_g FROM MealPlanner WHERE meal_type = 'Breakfast' AND fats_g < 10 ORDER BY calories ASC;
SELECT * FROM MealPlanner WHERE meal_name LIKE '%chicken%' OR meal_name LIKE '%salad%' ORDER BY meal_type, calories DESC;
SELECT * FROM MealPlan;
SELECT meal_name, calories_per_serving FROM MealPlan WHERE meal_type = 'Breakfast';
SELECT meal_id, meal_name, meal_type FROM MealPlan ORDER BY calories_per_serving DESC;
SELECT * FROM NutritionalRecommendations WHERE gender = 'Female' AND min_calories_per_day >= 2000;
SELECT age_range, min_calories_per_day, max_calories_per_day FROM NutritionalRecommendations WHERE recommendation_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT meal_name, calories_per_serving FROM MealPlan WHERE meal_type = 'Breakfast' ORDER BY meal_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MealPlan WHERE calories_per_serving > 500 AND meal_type = 'Lunch' ORDER BY meal_id ASC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_description FROM MealPlan WHERE meal_type = 'Dinner' AND calories_per_serving BETWEEN 300 AND 600;
SELECT * FROM NutritionalRecommendations WHERE gender = 'Female' AND min_calories_per_day < 2000;
SELECT recommendation_id, vitamin_requirements FROM NutritionalRecommendations WHERE age_range = '18-30';
SELECT * FROM meal_plans;
SELECT meal_plan_name, total_calories FROM meal_plans ORDER BY total_calories DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, weight_kg FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT meal_name, protein, carbs, fat FROM meals WHERE calories < 500;
SELECT user_id, user_name, daily_calorie_goal FROM users WHERE daily_calorie_goal BETWEEN 2000 AND 2500;
SELECT * FROM meal_plans WHERE total_calories > 2000 ORDER BY total_protein DESC;
SELECT meal_name, calories, protein, carbs, fat FROM meals WHERE carbs < 50 ORDER BY calories ASC;
SELECT user_name, age, weight_kg, height_cm FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND weight_kg > 70 ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT meal_plan_name, total_calories, total_protein, total_carbs, total_fat FROM meal_plans WHERE total_calories <= 1500 ORDER BY total_calories DESC, total_protein ASC;
SELECT user_name, daily_calorie_goal FROM users WHERE daily_calorie_goal BETWEEN 1500 AND 2000 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM meals;
SELECT meal_name, calories, proteins, carbs, fats FROM meals WHERE calories > 500;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, meal_name, meal_date FROM daily_meal_plan JOIN meals ON daily_meal_plan.meal_id = meals.meal_id;
SELECT nutrient_name, unit, recommended_daily_intake FROM nutritional_values WHERE recommended_daily_intake < 1000 ORDER BY nutrient_name ASC;
SELECT meal_name, calories, proteins, carbs, fats FROM meals;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, weight FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM daily_meal_plan WHERE meal_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-05';
SELECT nutrient_name, unit, recommended_daily_intake FROM nutritional_values ORDER BY nutrient_name DESC;
SELECT users.username, meals.meal_name, daily_meal_plan.meal_date FROM users JOIN daily_meal_plan ON users.user_id = daily_meal_plan.user_id JOIN meals ON meals.meal_id = daily_meal_plan.meal_id;
SELECT * FROM User_Profiles WHERE age < 30;
SELECT meal_name, calories_per_serving FROM Meal_Plans WHERE calories_per_serving > 500;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM User_Profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Meal_Ingredients WHERE serving_size >= 2 ORDER BY meal_id ASC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_type, calories_per_serving FROM Meal_Plans WHERE meal_type = 'Breakfast' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Meal_Plans
SELECT meal_name, meal_type, calories_per_serving FROM Meal_Plans
SELECT ingredient_name, calorie_count FROM Ingredients
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM User_Profiles
SELECT meal_id, ingredient_id, serving_size FROM Meal_Ingredients
